name: Mudaraba: Capital Verification (Hard Gate)
description: HARD GATE: Verify that capital (ras al-mal) has been transferred from capital provider to Mudarib before business operations begin

steps.title: Capital Amount Documentation
steps.description: Document the exact capital amount being contributed by Rab al-Mal

requiredEvidence.description: Written certification of capital amount (must be clearly quantified)
Signed agreement specifying exact capital amount

policyConstraints.constraint: Capital must be clearly quantified - vague or uncertain amounts not permitted

steps.title: Capital Transfer Verification
steps.description: Verify that capital has been transferred from Rab al-Mal to Mudarib's Mudaraba account

requiredEvidence.description: Bank statement or SWIFT confirmation showing capital transfer
Account statement showing capital received in designated Mudaraba account
Mudarib's written acknowledgment of capital receipt

policyConstraints.constraint: Capital must be transferred BEFORE Mudaraba business operations begin
Mudarib cannot conduct business using promised capital - actual transfer required

steps.title: SCO Capital Verification
steps.description: Shariah Compliance Officer confirms capital transfer meets Shariah requirements

requiredEvidence.description: SCO's confirmation that capital was transferred before operations
Analysis showing capital transfer date precedes business operations start date

policyConstraints.constraint: Mudaraba is invalid if business starts before capital is transferred

criticalNote: ⚠️ HARD GATE: Capital must be transferred BEFORE Mudaraba operations begin. Operating on promised (but not transferred) capital invalidates the Mudaraba per AAOIFI FAS-3 §2.
